description:
Joyous (DEMO)

This game is a proof of concept.

OH NO! Everyone has been cursed by an evil artifact and now nobody can move without exploding! Luckily, you weren't affected by the curse and now you must embark on a quest to save the world!

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • E - Use / Grab / ?̶̲͋?̶̣̮̆̕?̷̬͖̑̽͠
  • Space - Jump
  • 0-9 Num
Credits:

Music: fesliyastudios

Sound effects: sfxr.me

Made for: Mini Jam 97: Simulation

What is Joyous?

Joyous is a mix of 3D and 2D gameplay and puzzles. The idea is that in order to solve a puzzle in the arcade machine, you must explore your 3D surroundings for clues and vice versa.
While this is simply a prototype, the concept could be easily expanded upon with more time.
